淯字的基本解释

淯
yù
〔淯水〕今中国河南省白河的古称。亦作“育水”。
古通“育”，生养：“天淯阳，无计量。”

淯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》余六切，入屋，以。］
(1)古水名。即河南省白河，为汉江支流。
(2)“育”的古字。生；养。

淯字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淯； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页631第15
【唐韻】【集韻】?余六切，音育。水名。【說文】水出弘農盧氏山，東南入沔。【山海經】攻離之山，淯水出焉，南流注于漢。　又淯陽，縣名，在南陽郡。【前漢·地理志】作育陽。【後漢·郡國志】作淯陽。

淯字的起名意思

：今中国河南省白河的古称。亦作“育水”。

淯
Basic explanation of words
淯
yù
〔淯水〕The ancient name of Baihe, Henan Province, China today. Also known as "Yu Shui".
Gu Tong "educates", health: "Tianluoyang, no measurement."
淯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" Yu Liuqie, enter the house, take. ]
(1) Ancient water name. Namely, the Baihe River in Henan Province is a tributary of the Han River.
(2) The ancient word "education". Health; nourishment.
淯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Character Department] 　淯; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 631 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Liuqie, music education. Water name. [Said the text] The water flows out of Hongnong Lushi Mountain, and enters the southeast into Mian. [Shanhaijing] Attacking the mountain, Luoshui flows out of Yan, and the south flows to Han.　 And Luoyang, the county name, in Nanyang County. [Former Han Geography] as Yuyang. [The History of the Later Han Dynasty] was written in Luoyang.

Name meaning
: Now the ancient name of Baihe, Henan Province, China. Also known as "Yu Shui".
yù
〈名〉
淯河 Yu river, 发源于河南, 流入湖北。 也叫"白河"
